edu.utah.bmi.ibiomes.local.chem

Class LocalExperimentImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.utah.bmi.ibiomes.local.LocalDirectoryImpl
      • edu.utah.bmi.ibiomes.local.chem.LocalExperimentImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalExperiment, LocalDirectory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AMBERCollection, CHARMMCollection, DefaultLocalExperimentImpl, GAMESSCollection, GaussianCollection, GROMACSCollection, NAMDCollection, NWChemCollection

    public class LocalExperimentImpl
extends LocalDirectoryImpl
implements LocalExperiment
    Collection of local files. This class is used to publish local files to iRODS.
    Author:
    Julien Thibault
